title: Is there a way to have an app only work on wifi? IE. Facebook only works on wifi not mobile data?
content:
Hello, 

I am trying to turn off mobile data for certain apps so that they only work if on wifi. For my previous iPhone I had certain apps which would only work on wifi (Facebook, instagram, Reddit, etc.) as to save data.

Is that possible and how do you do this on a Pixel 5? 

Thank you,
